mapper.select: SELECT P.*, C.CATEGORY_NAME, D.DISCOUNT_PRICE, i.*, COALESCE(R2.csatAvg, 4.5) AS csatAvg FROM t3_tbl_product P JOIN t3_tbl_product_category C ON P.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_PRICE * (100 - DISCOUNT) / 100 AS DISCOUNT_PRICE FROM t3_tbl_product WHERE DISCOUNT_YN = 'Y' ) D ON P.PRODUCT_NO = D.PRODUCT_NO JOIN t3_tbl_product_image i ON P.PRODUCT_NO = i.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT R.PRODUCT_NO, ROUND(AVG(CSAT), 1) AS csatAvg FROM t3_tbl_user_review R JOIN t3_tbl_product P2 ON R.PRODUCT_NO=P2.PRODUCT_NO ) R2 ON P.PRODUCT_NO = R2.PRODUCT_NO JOIN( SELECT COUNT(*) AS BESTCNT, PRODUCT_NO FROM t3_tbl_user_order GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY BESTCNT DESC LIMIT 4 ) B ON P.PRODUCT_NO=B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE i.THUMBNAIL_YN ='Y' AND P.DELETE_YN = 'N'
